long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Corcava enables you to add contacts to your Corcava from any website, including LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, Gmail threads, and more.

Say goodbye to time-consuming copy-pasting; now you can effortlessly build your CRM with corcavaX. Eliminate the hassle of collecting contacts for prospecting, hiring, fundraising, and much more.

Here's how it works:

Download the free Corcava for Chrome extension.
Sign up on Corcava at https://corcava.com/.
Pin the Corcava extension to your Chrome browser.
With Corcava, you can add new contacts to your Corcava with just one click from a profile on any website, without needing to open Corcava. It syncs with your Corcava in real time, and you can also search and edit contacts through the corcavaX extension.

Corcava (https://corcava.com/) is the only business tool you need, combining CRM, Project Management Tool, Time Tracker, Communication, Scheduling, Payments and more!
